name: boilerplate
description: A simple boilerplate for creating websites with handlebars based templates.
author: Milan Bargiel

scriptsComments.stylelint: lint scss-files with rules specified in .stylelintrc.json
scriptsComments.postcss: use postcss to autoprefix css-files in out-folder without sourcemap in output
scriptsComments.copyfiles: copy top level files from assets folder to /out (ignore images folder)
scriptsComments.eslint: lint scss-files with rules specified in .eslintrc.json
scriptsComments.build:html: render templates with partials (filename starts with underscore) to out folder
scriptsComments.build:images: optimize images and output in out folder
scriptsComments.build:javascript: lint javascript and then copy all files to out folder
scriptsComments.serve: start a local dev server and reload browser on filechange in out folder
scriptsComments.start: run build and watch tasks in parallel
